violations.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
violations.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

nodes.html: Mer info om rutetider og billettkjøp finner du her ›
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.56 (foreground color: #e6332a, background color: #efe9df, font size: 12.8pt (17px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

violations.description: Ensure the order of headings is semantically correct
violations.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Heading order invalid

Fix any of the following:
  Heading order invalid

Fix all of the following:
  Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text

  Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty

  Element has no title attribute

violations.description: Ensure <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming
violations.help: Zooming and scaling must not be disabled

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  user-scalable on <meta> tag disables zooming on mobile devices
